ap_become_the_crisis_desc: All great works require sacrifice. The rest of the galaxy may not understand, but they will comply.
crisis_path_destruction_desc: Order is unnatural. The true nature of matter is in a chaotic state.\n\nWe are not destroying the universe - we are repairing it.
crisis_path_supremacy_desc: The right to rule belongs to whomever is victorious. We are claiming that right, and anyone is free to try and prove us wrong.
crisis_path_deception_desc: If everyone is looking at the dancing fools in the center of attention, you can do so much more in the shadows.
crisis_mean_destroy_starbase_desc: Destroying an enemy starbase will yield §H5§! £menace£ Menace.
crisis_mean_conquer_colony_desc: Conquering an enemy colony will yield §H10§! £menace£ Menace.
crisis_mean_destroy_empire_desc: Destroying an entire empire will yield §H100§! £menace£ Menace.
crisis_mean_defeat_fleet_desc: Defeating an enemy fleet will yield §H1§! £menace£ Menace per Naval Capacity.
menacing_actions_destruction_destroy_enc: Destroying an enclave will yield §H100§! £menace£ Menace.
menacing_actions_supremacy_enslave_speci: Enslaving an entire species will yield §H5§! £menace£ Menace annually.
menacing_actions_supremacy_have_vassal_d: Having vassals will yield §H10§! £menace£ Menace annually.
menacing_actions_supremacy_vassalize_emp: Vassalizing an empire will yield §H100§! £menace£ Menace.
menacing_actions_supremacy_invade_primit: Invading primitive worlds will yield §H1§! £menace£ Menace per £pops£ Pop.
menacing_actions_supremacy_sent_marauder: Sending a Marauder Raid will yield §H50§! £menace£ Menace per £pops£ Pop.
menacing_actions_deception_force_resolut: Forcing a proposal through - despite a majority of voters opposing it - will yield §H5§! £menace£ Menace.
menacing_actions_deception_council_posit: Sit on the Galactic Community Council
Having a position on the Galactic Community Council will yield §H10§! £menace£ Menace annually.
menacing_actions_deception_veto_resoluti: Vetoing a resolution will yield §H100§! £menace£ Menace per resolution.
menacing_actions_deception_call_in_favor: Calling in a favor will yield §H1§! £menace£ Menace per £favor£ Favor.
menacing_actions_deception_win_humiliati: Winning a Humiliation War will yield §H200§! £menace£ Menace.
crisis_perks_supremacy_privateering_desc: Attack them ourselves?! Oh, please - We have people who do that for us.
crisis_perks_supremacy_privateering_unlo: Hire a total of 4 Marauder Fleets in order to unlock this $crisis_perk$.
crisis_perks_supremacy_primus_inter_pare: They are our equals. And they will concur with that statement, or else...
Be the leader of a Hegemony Federation with at least 3 other members.
§G+5 Federation Naval Capacity§! per Federation member.
crisis_perks_supremacy_support_is_mandat: You are, of course, free to object to our demands. However, if you do, we will annihilate you.
Have at least 4 Vassals under your empire to unlock this $crisis_perk$.
Each vassal contributes +10% more £energy£ Energy and £mineral£ Minerals every month.
Gain +20 Naval Capacity for every vassal under your empire.
crisis_perks_deception_lord_of_red_tape_: Simple! Fill in Federal Form 68-XM, hand it over to Section 11-B no later than the 21st, request three copies of...
Propose 3 sanctions in the Galactic Community to unlock this $crisis_perk$.
Gain immunity to being §P'in breach'§! of Galactic Community law.
crisis_perks_deception_dance_puppets_des: You know how this goes: you scratch my back, and I refrain from obliterating yours.
crisis_perks_deception_dance_puppets_unl: Call in 20 £favor£ Favors to unlock this $crisis_perk$.
crisis_perks_deception_dance_puppets_act: Calling in £favor£ Favors cost no £influence£ Influence.
crisis_perks_deception_shadowplay_desc: What you know about us, you know because we let you. What we know about you is 'everything'.
crisis_perks_deception_shadowplay_unlock: Complete §H10 Operations§! in order to unlock this $crisis_perk$.
crisis_perks_deception_shadowplay_passiv: Espionage actions are +20% faster, and have a -20% cost.
become_the_crisis_chain_desc: We balance over the chasm of a bloody future as the gravity of destiny claws at us.\n\nAs we gaze into the abyss, we see only ourselves staring back.
war_goal_wg_path_destruction_desc: Set forth to annihilate and cause havoc of excessive proportions.
MENACE_PERK_ALREADY_ACTIVE: Menace Perk $PERK|Y$ is already active for $COUNTRY|Y$
MENACE_PERK_NOT_ACTIVE: Menace Perk $PERK|Y$ is not active for $COUNTRY|Y$
CRISIS_TAB_DISABLED: Only available with $TRAD|Y$ or §Y$ap_cosmogenesis$§! Ascension Perk
can_advance_crisis_progression: The next level of our §YCrisis Progression§! has been unlocked
can_advance_crisis_progression_final: The §Rfinal level§! of our §YCrisis Progression§! has been unlocked
count_owned_army_all_trigger: $IS_ALL_NOT$ Owned Armies fulfill the following conditions
personality_became_the_crisis_desc: Crisis Aspirants are would-be harbingers of galactic doom, backed by unknowable powers.
